pkgmetadata.longdescription: Download Charitable Grants from the '360Giving' Platform // Access open data from https://www.threesixtygiving.org, a database of charitable grant giving in the UK operated by '360Giving'. The package provides functions to search and retrieve data on charitable grant giving, and process that data into tidy formats. It relies on the '360Giving' data standard, described at https://standard.threesixtygiving.org/.
